page.title: 16LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: In Gullane and Dirleton playgrounds there are lots of different games.Ball games e.g.shapes,wall-ball,drought and elephant's bum.Tig games e.g.buzz off, line tig,tunnel tig and cats and dogs. Group games e.g.1-2-3,Brits-Jerries, cutlery,old maid,farmer-farmer,what's the time Mr.Wolf,oranges - lemons and in and out the dusty bluebells.Other games played are conkers,marbles,polo, sleeping tigers,skipping,races,belts, aeroplane,motor-bikes,secret tunnels, kiss,cuddle and torture,hallyover and British bulldog. Wall-ball is played with a small ball, a wall and 2 to 4 people.The object of the game is to hit the ball with your hand so that it bounces once before it hits the wall.Each player starts with 3 points and loses a point each time he fails to hit the ball or return it correctly.0 points = out!
